sentences.sContent: Q comes between P and R in the English alphabet.
sentences.sCn: 英语字母表中，Q在P和R之间。

sentences.sContent: I sat down between Jo and Diana.
sentences.sCn: 我在乔和黛安娜中间坐下。

sentences.sContent: ...it not only serves as crucial bridge to build trust and connection between two generations but also exerts a profound and subtle influence toward to children’s personal growth...
...said Addison probably overheard a conversation between family members talking about the funds needed to get her little brother to treatment...
...a relatively formal distance should be kept between professors and their students...
...the relationship between doctors and patients has been a heated topic...
...it is imperative to cultivate the respect between generations...

...it is indispensable that communication between doctor and patients should be strengthened due to the the fact that doctor-patient communication can be seen as a bridge of two-way communication between doctors and patients...
...childhood curiosity is a collaboration between child and adult, the surest way to kill it is to leave it alone...
...maintaining a formal distance between teachers and students can ensure an atmosphere of authority in the classroom and avoid both real and perceived bias...
...One reason to maintain a formal distance between students and teachers is to highlight the instructor’s role as an authority figure...

phrases.pCn: 只限于咱俩之间；我们之间的秘密
只限于咱们之间；秘密的

trans.tranOther: in or into the space separating two or more points, objects, people, etc.
